name: Test API Integration
description: Run comprehensive API integration tests including success and failure scenarios

action.message:
Act as the QA Testing Agent using #qa-testing-agent context. Please test the Sonrai API integration:

1. Review src/sonrai_client.py for all API methods
2. Create/update tests for:
   - Successful API responses
   - Authentication failures
   - Network timeouts
   - Rate limiting
   - Invalid response data
   - Missing fields in responses
3. Run the API tests with mocked responses
4. Verify error handling and logging
5. Report any issues or missing test coverage

Ensure all API failure scenarios are properly handled.
